description: Comprehensive API endpoint analysis and CRUD validation for all 26 backend modules

workstreams.name: Module Inventory and Route Analysis
tasks: Analyze route definitions in each module's index.ts/js
Map HTTP methods to CRUD operations
Identify controller and service layer files

workstreams.name: CRUD Operations Matrix Creation
tasks: Create comprehensive CRUD matrix for all modules

workstreams.name: API Architecture Recommendations
tasks: Define RESTful API structure for each module
Document API design patterns and standards

decisions.decision: Analyze all 26 modules found (not just the 15 core modules mentioned in docs)
decisions.rationale: Complete API coverage requires examining all existing modules including auth, dashboard, ai, metrics, etc.
